name: Dreadnaught-Class Heavy Cruiser
Lore: 'Introduced during the Clone Wars. 600 meters long. Some have cargo space converted to TIE hanger bays. Still used to maintain an Imperial presence in the Outer Rim.',
Text: 'May add 3 pilots, 6 passengers and 4 TIEs. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilots provide total ability of 2. Turbolaser Battery may deploy aboard. Your TIEs present are each power +1.',
